verses.verse: And it shall be, when thou art come in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and possessest <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, and dwellest <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therein;

That thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>, which thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, and shalt put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in a basket <S%H2935><s%>, and shalt go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to place <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8763><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there.

And thou shalt go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> that shall be in those days <S%H3117><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto him, I profess <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, that I am come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the country <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%> for to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> us.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the basket <S%H2935><s%> out of thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and set it down <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8689><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And thou shalt speak <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, A Syrian <S%H761><s%> ready to perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8802><s%> was my father <S%H1><s%>, and he went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and sojourned <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there with <S%H4962><s%> a few <S%H4592><s%>, and became there a nation <S%H1471><s%>, great <S%H1419><s%>, mighty <S%H6099><s%>, and populous <S%H7227><s%>:

And the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> evil entreated <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us, and afflicted <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8762><s%> us, and laid <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon us hard <S%H7186><s%> bondage <S%H5656><s%>:

And when we cried <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> our voice <S%H6963><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on our affliction <S%H6040><s%>, and our labour <S%H5999><s%>, and our oppression <S%H3906><s%>:

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with great <S%H1419><s%> terribleness <S%H4172><s%>, and with signs <S%H226><s%>, and with wonders <S%H4159><s%>:

And he hath brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us into this place <S%H4725><s%>, and hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us this land <S%H776><s%>, even a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

And now, behold, I have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the firstfruits <S%H6529><s%> <S%H7225><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%>, which thou, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, hast given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me. And thou shalt set <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and worship <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8694><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>:

And thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in every good <S%H2896><s%> thing which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee, and unto thine house <S%H1004><s%>, thou, and the Levi <S%H3881><s%>, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is among <S%H7130><s%> you.

When thou hast made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of tithing <S%H6237><s%> <S%H8687><s%> all the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of thine increase <S%H8393><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, which is the year <S%H8141><s%> of tithing <S%H4643><s%>, and hast given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it unto the Levi <S%H3881><s%>, the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and the widow <S%H490><s%>, that they may eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, and be filled <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8804><s%>;

Then thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, I have brought away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> out of mine house <S%H1004><s%>, and also have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them unto the Levi <S%H3881><s%>, and unto the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, to the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and to the widow <S%H490><s%>, according to all thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me: I have not transgressed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, neither have I forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them:

I have not eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thereof in my mourning <S%H205><s%>, neither have I taken away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> ought thereof for any unclean <S%H2931><s%> use, nor given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ought thereof for the dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%>: but I have hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> according to all that thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.

Look down <S%H8259><s%> <S%H8685><s%> from thy holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>, from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and the land <S%H127><s%> which thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us, as thou swarest <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

This day <S%H3117><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> these statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%>: thou shalt therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them with all thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Thou hast avouched <S%H559><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to be thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and to hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto his voice <S%H6963><s%>:

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath avouched <S%H559><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> to be his peculiar <S%H5459><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, as he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee, and that thou shouldest keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>;

And to make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee high <S%H5945><s%> above all nations <S%H1471><s%> which he hath made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, in praise <S%H8416><s%>, and in name <S%H8034><s%>, and in honour <S%H8597><s%>; and that thou mayest be an holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, as he hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.
